!Hestui Totem Spirit: ... growl ... Who dares to speak to me? I have poor eyesight so I cannot see you well, but I can smell ... You smell like a shaman! You are no doubt one who has come to steal the secrets of the spirits! Go away, before I bite off your head and swallow your heart!
